title: The Magic of Esmerelda
description: The newest book in the award-winning children's book series, The Magic of Esmerelda.On Wednesday, Esmerelda’s friend Riley has an accidental spill in the school lunchroom. It’s funny for the other children to see, but not very much fun for Riley. Esmerelda sets an example that is different from that of the other kids, and Riley sees the benefit of being able to laugh at yourself when you do something silly – which we all do from time to time! Esmerelda’s simple magic is something we are all capable of creating. Help children discover how our everyday actions have a profound impact on our friendships and the world around us.Wednesday is the fourth book in the seven-part picture book series, The Magic of Esmerelda.
author: Khristin Wierman
